蟬科.definition: Cicadidae, homopterous insect family including cicada

蟬翼.definition: cicada's wing; fig. diaphanous; delicate texture

蟬聯.definition: to continue in a post; (to hold a post) several times in succession; (to win a title) in successive years; to stay at number one; to defend a championship

蟬蛻.definition: cicada slough; fig. to free oneself; to extricate oneself from

蟬鳴.definition: song of cicadas; chirping of insects
